caption.title: Test of the impact that sea-level distribution characteristics have on the survival function.
caption.p: Panel a displays the probability density function (pdf) of our global mean sea-level rise in the year 2100 (dark red) along with the normal (light blue), log normal (blue), and Pareto (dark blue) distribution approximations of global mean sea-level rise in the year 2100. In panel b, the survival function accounting for each sea-level rise approximation (light to dark blue) is shown for comparison to the baseline storm surge (yellow) and the survival function accounting for our estimated empirical sea-level rise pdf (dark red).
Click here for additional data file.
